data.text:
PRTM 2540 STUDY GUIDE

Spring 2023

Midterm Exam

This study guide is comprised of key topics from the first half of the semester. Questions will come from PowerPoint/lectures and readings on these topics. The midterm will cover chapters 1-9 in the textbook. This is NOT a comprehensive or exhaustive list of everything we have discussed over the course of the first seven weeks, and not everything on this study guide will appear on the exam. In addition, there will be some questions on the exam that the key topics or terms do not appear below.

There will be approximately 25-30 questions on the exam, a combination of multiple choice, true/false and short answer.

Class/Lectures:

Management Concepts and Practice

Managing and Leading Sport Organizations

Key Topics/Terms contâ€™d:

Historical Aspects of Sport Managing Sport & Developing a Professional Perspective Community and Youth Sport Interscholastic Athletics Professional Sports Adaptive Athletics

Key Topics/Terms: What is sport What is sport management Competencies in sport management Economies of scope Economies of scale Management approaches Best practices for community rec sports Benefits of community rec sports Role of citizens in community rec sports Primary source(s) of revenue in community rec sports Types of Disabilities What is a congenital disability What are examples of a congenital disability What is an acquired disability What are examples of an acquired disability What is a neuromuscular disorder

Examples of a neuromuscular disorder Paralympic Classification System Groupings Why is the classification system used in Paralympics A. Spalding & Brothers Economies of scope Economies of scale Management approaches Luxury tax League think Free agency Sherman Antitrust Act
